content: I was having the same app breaking issues for a year that others were reporting. Like how the only buttons that would work were Home & Cart and the rest was unusable. The app even crashes on launch on the latest version. But all the issues I was having resolved after clearing the app data first (and it still somehow auto signed me in afterwards)! Seems like they broke associations with past app data at some point. I strongly recommend you try resetting the app first too if you're having issues.

userName: Gordon Hamilton Currie, Lord of Glencoe
content: Have used the app to distraction for several years but this last couple of weeks it freezes. Takes ages before it works again! Extremely frustrating, given that Amazon have trained me like a monkey to use the app ad nauseam. I've uninstslled/reinstalled several times, restarted my mobile....read the reviews/frustrations of others....Uh oh! Something's not working... Sort it out quickly Amazon , or I, like 1000's of others will defect.

Amazon quality overall is declining fast! Something is wrong with every other order. Either delivery is delayed and delivered days after PROMISED time or item is lost. If item is actually delivered, it is either poor quality or missing items. Prices have increased as well. I thought shopping on Amazon would save me time and money. Lately I've just been going around to local stores to buy products at a lower price, better quality and at least I actually have it!

I use Amazon a lot, and most of the features work for me, but the most important feature I use doesn't seem to. I can no longer look at my orders through the phone app, it's on a constant load screen and it's frustrating, since it seems to only work if I open the tracking through my email and it launches the app. I shouldn't have to go through a roundabout process just to track my orders.

What is going on with AMAZON?!?!? I use this app for almost all my shopping. Now I'm having to uninstall and reinstall like every week. This DOES NOT make me feel secure about all my information Amazon has available to it. After all these years of GREAT service, for the 1st time, I'm thinking of deleting my account. Amazon shows ads on FB. If I see something I'm interested in, and I go to click on it, it will almost ALWAYS shut down everything. I've noticed some in store glitches, as well.

No transparency.... Even with Amazon Prime paid service, I can't rely on delivery date (quite often wrong) esp when they dropped it off at USPS on the promised date. Right on their promise cor them!!! But then I have to WAIT for USPS to deliver to my home a few days later. Bummer. And there's no way to know how Amazon delivers to me when I order it. If I have a time sensitive project or travel date coming up. I'd rather go straight to my local stores. Much more reliable than Prime service.

The more they add to the app in an effort to make it "more user friendly", the more issues I end up having. Now there is so much lag on product pages that it's not worth the hassle of being on the app. It freezes mid scroll from product description to the reviews. It might resume scrolling after a significant wait. Usually I have to exit the page and start over. It's becoming to much of a hassle to do this new ritual to look for items. #bringbackamazonsmile

Wish I could actually scroll down on this app. Really? Update! You can no longer buy Amazon Ebooks through the Amazon App which is totally BS! Google Play and Amazon are turning out to be HORRIBLE especially changing this feature. Unacceptable! The app is slowly getting worse where I can't transfer to other lists without it going slow or kicking me off, deleting an item takes forever, and sometimes I can't even scroll my lists. This app needs a huge upgrade! It is really NOT a good app.

I used to find this app easy to use and full of information. Now it seems to be full of ads and hype. Can be very challenging to order and i sometimes give up and order elaewhere. Example: i wanted a protective case for my Samsung Flip4, previously easy for my prior phone, and Amazon flooded me with vendor ads so that i ended uo getting another case from the same company whose product wore poorly. Case 2 is even worse than case 1. The reviews had plenty of "spin" IMHO.

App itself is reliable but it auto plays ads and there's no way to disable it. There's pretty much no settings whatsoever in the settings menu either. As I can't give Amazon itself a negative review, I'm docking two stars from this for recent changes to the music app. Now without paying a extra $10 a month ON TOP OF prime, I can't even play full albums or download songs I've already paid for.

My main problem: every time you tap on something and attempt to return to the main "sales feed", the whole feed resets and you can't continue looking at the same things your were looking at before. The 2nd thing: if I refresh the feed intentionally, how about showing me something I haven't already seen. 3rd thing: Trash items everywhere. Absolutely no integrity. But everyone knows that about Amazon already.

Not a problem with the app. My issue is with Amazon itself. It used to be that when you put in for an order, they would withdraw the funds immediately. Now they wait until they ship your item to deduct funds, which is beyond inconvenient because there are other things I need to put my funds towards on a day to day basis. So I end up spending money I don't have because my mind has forgotten about my Amazon order until they attempt to take the money when my item(s) ship. Money I likely won't have.

One of the best apps but needs Night Mode! I am a vampire it's very difficult for me to shop when everything is so bright all the time. Please for the love of God, make a dark/night mode! Otherwise it's one of the best apps. It loads quickly, shows me relevant suggestions, and never crashes. Well done amazon, I expect nothing less from you!

Every time it's updated over the past few months at times it won't even open!! Have to delete it and then reinstall from the App store to hopefully get it to work. Seriously considering ending my Amazon prime account and just build up orders over the $35.00 threshold for free shipping. I've been a Walmart plus member for over a year and have had excellent results so far. Even free grocery delivery and free Paramount plus with membership fee .

App barely works now. I love Amazon and have been a prime member for years. The app does use a lot of cellphone data so I try not to use it too often off of wifi. Recently, maybe after the last update, the app is unbearably slow or crashes. I work and live in the city using T-mobile's cell towers. I shouldn't have an issue with data coverage. Even after restarting my Samsung S21 FE, the app never improves.

More and more orders are delivered later than expected. The best and most unique feature of Amazon Prime, and the reason I shopped there over other stores, is the free 2 day shipping they offered. That is no longer the case, most items don't offer 2 day shipping at all and many items are arriving later than expected. They used to be so much better. It's not really worth paying so much for Prime any more. Without 2 day shipping, I might as well shop somewhere else that can deliver on time.

Want to buy an audiobook outright? Well, too bad. You can ONLY receive a marketing email. Unless, of course, you want to pay money for an Audible subscription. You know, on top of your Amazon, Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, etc. You need more subscriptions. You're still going to need to pay more money to Bezos if you go through more than 1 book a month, though. I hope you like giving your money away.

The app has started including animations and video previews which cannot be turned off. I have autism and find it very difficult to ignore the distraction of an animation and find it extremely intrusive and unpleasant. As an accommodation there should be a setting to disable all animations and video previews in this and every other app please and thank you.

After updates I swear these apps get worse. Now the two step verification isn't even sensing text to my phone? And I can't rent a movie, I hardly see pictures of past purchases, the list just keeps growing of issues. It will take one person to make another app similar that actually functions for people to lose interest in the one that has too many issues.

It's good (when it works) but I've been having some problems with it loading the pictures of the items I want to look at or just everything in general. It says that the page couldn't load. I have outstanding internet and everything else on my phone works and loads right but for some reason this app doesn't want to load. If it helps this happens every little update that you do aside from quantity of items.

Easy to use the app but the refund process is terrible for a lot of electronic items it seems. Amazon takes a distanced response to 3rd party retailer items with refunds taking over a month to process and collections being consistently delayed by them not taking action and just adding red flags to things without following up with anybody. Overall make bigger purchases at stores near you and only buy small things off of Amazon.

The app is really slow, tested on different wifi and mobile data connections. Picture loading times ridiculously long. Main page still reloading every time when I go back from an item description, so I can't continue to browsing, I have to start from the beginning every time. This is frustrating so I just rather stop using the app. I don't like either if I check an item in any reason the app starts offering me more about similar products, but I'm not interested at all.

The only complaint that I have currently is this: whoever thought of the "brilliant" idea to make canceling channel subscriptions only on the web page instead of the app deserves janitor duty for a year. I say this because since I can not cancel channel subscriptions on the app, I must uninstall the app completely so I can access the web page. Otherwise, when I try and access the web page from my phones browser, the app will take the place of the web page every time. This needs to be fixed asap.

Don't know what's happening with this app, as I have unistalled it, reinstalled several times, but it doesn't open on the sign in pane. Instead it keeps showing "There was a problem", a long list of countries, "If you are a new member, fill in name etc.". "Already a member, enter email address", which I do, but it doesn't accept it or open the app. I see other people are having issues as well, so come on Amazon, start reading this feedback and act on it!

Misleading review sorting. Default sorts by "top" reviews, which is arbitrary. Doesn't give you the option to change the sort, like most recent, or most helpful. It just shows you all the 5 star reviews. Not helpful if you want to weigh the pros and cons. Also no way to click to view or rate the full review of ones with images/videos.

So, this app is largely OK. Decent shopping experience, however, if you shop exclusively with gift cards like me (malware concern), you're likely going to run into a problem at some point. For some reason, even when you're above the 25$ minimum for free shipping, it will still auto everything you're ordering to standard over free. This normally wouldn't be an issue, but if you don't have enough to pay for it, it won't allow you to go to the next page to change it to free so you can afford it.

Always issues... If it's not with lost orders or returns, then it's delays and then damaged or not as described items. (My location is basic suburbs delivery is never a problem so its not that)Customer service is okay but at the end of the day, my time is wasted calling, waiting for my money or order...whats the point? That's the exact opposite of what I thought the company was offering.. then their excuse is "our systems". I don't recommend at all. Not worth the headache.

I like it and it's very easy to manage my orders. However recently it freezes while browsing; usually when I'm trying to scroll vertically. The other controls become unresponsive. After about a minute, the app restarts, losing any entries I've made. I have a Moto G6 phone running Android 9, and Motorola discontinued OS updates a year ago..

Brilliant shopping experience but please fix this bug in the app which is really beginning to annoy me: occasionally when you start the app there is a splash screen reminding you about Prime, you tap the acknowledge button and then are left with a blank screen. The solution is to restart the app to be able to do anything.... If the app starts without the splash screen then all is fine..... Grrrr

This app genuinely bricks your phone. It takes 5 minutes to open, it's super slow once it does, and it drains your battery faster than anything even while only on in the background. When I opened this app I would have to restart my phone afterwards just maintain usability for the day. Have since uninstalled it - do not use this app, simply access the website on your phones browser instead ( Fire Fox is best!)

They have disabled voice from my Google keyboard on an Android. There are countless items I've tried to add to my cart while walking or browsing something and couldn't. I suspect this has something to do with their desire to keep Google from knowing what I search for but it is costing them money. I don't want to use their voice icon. Why are they trying to change my normal mode of input? Bad UX

Rather lacking. Still no dark mode for example. For some reason one of the last updates made it harder searching purchase history because it will no longer search the entire history at once. One must go through year by year which is complete nonsense and is one of the dumbest changes to an app ever. Get it together Amazon. The discontinuation of Amazon Smile is also absurd.

Absolutely horrible!!!! Changed my region without my knowledge (from Germany to USA) which caused me to browse a market that would be way more expensive for me in the long run, sent me the confirmation mail of an order with one price but then sometime later when i was sleeping with a much heftier price. I can't cancel it, if i send it back and they refund me, they'll only refund me the product's price and the shipping is costier than the product itself

When I first downloaded the app years ago, it was fantastic and everything was working great. But lately, I mean I can still order things, but I've lost 2 of my save lists and it doesn't show all my orders/purchases.. Like I purchased some things last week, and they aren't coming up when I check the status of my orders on the app. Does anyone know what's happened?

This app is really good. I've gotten orders the exact way Advertised, and found everything I looked for. But what gave this a four star rating was what has been happening recently. So currently, I'm making my birthday wishlist, and I wanted to add some things to it. But when I was trying to go to my list, it was loading for a whole hour. After that, I tried restarting my phone, didn't work. I also tried deleting and reinstalling amazon, also didn't work. I've cleared my cache, still didn't work.

Besides finding almost everything on here it's a Bust that Shipping is so Much if you don't Subscribe to a Membership, even when you spend over the 25$ you'll still catch fees. Of course they automatically add a more expensive shipping than starting off with the Cheaper Route üôÑ Returning isn't always the best either, sometimes you don't need an Excuse to why you need to return it and it's not an Option. And if you did pay for Shipping you don't get that back.

Issues with deal notifications. When I received the notifications, I click them to open the app. The app opens on Amazon splash screen and just freezes there. So I actually miss the deal completely. Everything else is ok. But every once in a while, you look forward to the deals...

This is the worst app at checkout I use for all my online shopping, had to disable the backup payment method because the payment process should ask for the 3 digits on the back of the card and then ask for the bank's authorisation, this didn't happen on my prime membership renewal, last year or this year, even after being asked to confirm which payment method to use just prior to the renewal date. Had a nightmare of a time trying to sort it with Amazon customer services afterwards üò°

REMOVE THAT ANNOYING NEW "INSPIRE" TAB YOU SNEAKED IN! ONLY GETS IN THE WAY! It's a no-brainer that at any time an item(s) that are on your list, cart/save for later, change in price...either get notified or show some indicator like you do in the cart/save for later section. Also, that indicator I'm speaking about only functions for the viewable items, not the ones that are hidden away which only appear if you scroll down. Not cool. Please fix.

When I open the app, underlined links are shown, but there are no pictures for ANY of the listing. If I try to go to settings or my account or anything else, I get a 'uh-oh, something went wrong on our end. We'll try to fix it.'. It's been completely UNUSABLE for MONTHS and at this point it's just ridiculous. Updates don't help, I'm not in the Beta program, un-installing and re-installing does nothing, customer support can't help, and time doesn't help either. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME.

Latest update has the app freezing and not doing anything when clicking on things. It is very slow. Also I noticed that it offers wrong products when you search by name. Like men's work socks. It was showing me flip flops, slippers and shoes along with summer trainer socks and the occasional safety boot worthy socks. When I choose view from low to high all the low prices I was seeing before don't cone up in the search results at all and it is all really random rubbish. Like playing cards.

I love shopping with Amazon. The app itself is easy to use and very intuative. The store is just amazing. If you can't find it on Amazon, it is either illegal or doesn't exist. The prices are, at worst, comparable to other well known stores and, at best, considerably lower. Amazon Shopping is my favorite place to find everything from cleaning supplies and pet supplies to gifts, foodstuffs from around the world, furniture and gardening supply and equipment.

The ability to track my package is very important to me. To know that it's so many stops away so I don't leave the house means a lot. Unfortunately your program does not show me that it's in transit. I receive emails and text messages telling me this but the map does not update showing that it has been in route to my house. Doesn't even show me where the car is at all. It only tells me after it gets here. It's kind of defeats the purpose of having the ability to track my package.

I cant even open the prime tab or my prime payment options.. When I try it just flashes over and over like it's trying to load and I can't back out of it. I have to close the app to make it stop. I've un-installed and reinstalled and force stopped and cleared cache but it's still happening. This just isn't user friendly at all anymore.

This service used to be worth the price for prime, but both delivary and service has fallen to a point of regret. The pros no longer outweigh the cons for the prime membership. They keep trying to go around the prime shipping unless manually changing every single purchase. There have been multiple issues with missing items and when issues do occur the customer service is always 50/50. Even with amazon gift cards not working and customer service refusing to help

Since the last update the Amazon app will start and show a white screen with the word Amazon and stop loading. This needs to be fixed. Still freezes from time to time with a, white screen with the word Amazon in the middle. I reinstalled the app and now it is, happing more often. I'm now having to use the web site. I have dropped my rating as low, as I can get until they fix this problem. My phone is an Android phone with Android 13.

Awful! The worst! I had an undeliverable item and yet I have had Amazon deliver numerous products to this address. I get an email that states I'll get a refund in 3-5 business days, it's been two weeks and no emails, their app does not help. The app does not tell you anything in "your orders". Customer service has automated answers to their questions. I want my refund so I can deactivate my account. I will no longer be using Amazon.

I don't know what is going on with this app Lately. Even after an update, I still can't access older orders. It just keeps doing this glitch thing. Almost May and still the same. It's been like this since February. Sucks when trying to look at orders to pick up or return. I've done updates and reinstalled, and nothing has worked.

Their internal system is just as disorganized and unorderly as their hiring process. I've been locked out of my account after not signing in for a while and rightfully forgot my password and the old card on my account expired, have denied both times I've tried submitting documents to revoke the suspension, signed me up for a Prime subscription without my authorization, and charged my card that supposedly caused the suspension to begin with. The app and website are also rife with scams.

Amazon, you need to fix your app ASAP. The app basically shows you things that you can't buy! Once you collect all your needs in the basket and you proceed to the payment, it'll tell ya, " Ops something went wrong with these items, it cannot be shipped to your address/ country." Since this is the Saudi Amazon, I expect every item in there is legal to be shipped to saudi, or it shouldn't be shown in the app in first place.

I depend on this app for everything, my food, personal items, home goods, and parts for my oxygen machine ( like columns I ordered this week when alarm signaled they needed to be replaced), nebulizer parts, meds and bandages, etc... I am in a wheelchair and have no other way of shopping, so when I couldn't get my Amazon APP to open, this started the beginning of April, It was more than frustrating, and I'm not the only one with this problem. You need to leave things that work fine, alone!

The app itself works fine, but it has a really frustrating bug. Any amazon Weblink forwards one to the Amazon appz instead of opening in the browser and whatever store and language settings were used on the website get copied over to the app. So if you click an amazon link in a different language, your amazon app will now always be in that language, until you manually change the language again. This is terribly frustrating.

Given that this map stupidity is still not fixed after several months, I'm downgrading it to 1 star and significantly minimizing my Amazon purchases. Starting with update 26.4.0.100, the app has an overlay that partially blocks the delivery progress map. It can't be moved or dismissed. Extremely annoying!! Terrible design decision. Please fix!!! The positive is that this stupidity led me to Temu and AliExpress. üòÅ

Amazon sells some great quality products but most are bad quality with 3 stars or less. Some feedback; Amazon should sell better quality items. Not items that rip, tear, break, smudge, and more. In conclusion, sure! Go ahead and download Amazon to buy stuff but when you find something you want to buy, check the reviews first to see if you'll be getting a good deal or basically being scammed. Hope this helps!

Tracking has stopped working completely on my tablet. Works fine on my phone, but just suddenly stopped working on my Samsung Galaxy S6 tablet. Doesn't work within the App from my orders or from an email hyperlink. Initially thought email hyperlink was the problem. It's not. It's the App on tbe tablet. I cleaned cache, made sute if all permissions, I uninstalled and reinstalled. Same problem. EDIT- Bought a brand new Samsung S8 Plus tablet. Same exact issue. Tracking link goes to ERROR PAGE.

Not really sure what the point of prime is if the company still picks and chooses when they want to ship your items and how long it's delayed. Even if it's something that should be delivered the next day. It's a miserable experience. And their streaming app doesn't make up for it. I'm really not sure if there are actually any perks at this point with prime. Not to mention I get more sponsored listings than anything else. It's just so off-putting.

I tried to change my email address and phone because I couldn't access them anymore, and when I did, it wanted me to verify using one of those two options. When I selected try another way, it didn't give me an option for can't access phone or email, and when I went to help they made me speak to a foreign agent on the phone who didn't know any more than me and was reading off the screen, and couldn't understand what I meant. Ridiculous.

This app has really gone through so much ups and downs, it's so useful one moment than not at all. It has been freezing with the Amazon name so you have to force stop it then when the logo comes up (brown smiley box) it works correctly BUT that's only about half the times, I don't want to have to keep force stopping an app most of the time I need it... PLEASE fix üòë

I prefer shopping online then in-store. Amazon makes this possible! They have a lot of products & if you're looking for something & can't find it in-stores, you can usually find it here. I am a loyal Amazon Prime member, & I believe the Prime membership is worth buying. My deliveries usually arrive fast, & the Prime Benefits are a plus. They also have great customer service! (which is extremely important to me) Amazon makes the shopping experience enjoyable for me & I hope they will for you!

Data usage! I don't want automatically playing videos when I'm browsing for something in the app. It's ridiculous how much data this app uses in a matter of minutes while shopping. I see no options to disable these video streams in the settings of the app. Or anything related to data usage.

I üíï Amazon even though it is basically just a front for the CIA. It has won my heart with low low prices & free shipping on wonderful items from all over the world. However, while convenient in some circumstances, this app has significant limitations compared to just shopping directly on the website through a browser. I like to open multiple tabs to compare items & the app doesn't allow that. Can't purchase streaming movies & Kindle books. Just use the website instead. #BringBackBezos

Amazon changed again.... Now there using a item selection "from !!$" this is really bad. Let's say your looking for a DVD player and it is marked as from 12$ then when your on the page you see it is for a cable and the DVD player is 30$. This is misleading and takes more time to find what you want. AWFUL!

When looking at the list of items in the search feature, you're shown the PICTURE of the most expensive item tied to the listing, but also shown the least expensive PRICE. So when you click into it, you then see that information for 2 separate items were shown just to get you to click into the item.

I use Amazon alot for shopping and love it. But there is one thing that makes me tressed. When you make a purchase and you wamt to review it and check pricing and details, you have to go through so many menus and it constantly changing. It feelis like Amazon what to hid things from you. This should be easy to do if they realy dont have anything to hid. I find it dishonest. Please fix.

The performance has gotten worse and worse to the point a browser is now faster. Not to mention the app freezes and locks you out any time your connection resets, such as switching from mobile to wifi. Unacceptable for a company as large as Amazon to fail at their core service - allowing one to shop.

PLEASE FIX how orders are displayed! They USED to be in order of when they'll be delivered, with delivered/closed orders at the bottom. It was well organized. It was THE reason I preferred the Android app over iOS. Now it's as bad as iOS, with orders of all statuses mixed up. I have to scroll through old ones to find things still on their way. The sorting options don't help with this‚Äîplease add this option to sort by delivery date! TOO EASY TO MISS MISSING ORDERS! Is this what you're going for?

It's Great, and ALMOST perfect. So, I have the prime and have been paying prime for 7ish years. But the yearly price for prime has gone up a lot, these past few years. Also, when you go to checkout, it offers you $1.50-$3.00 if you have it delivered on Amazon Day. But, you can ONLY use that credit on select digital purchases. I don't use digital anything. I'm old school. I would love to be able to use that towards cleaning supplies, laundry supplies, or personal hygiene stuff. Please‚ô•Ô∏é

Great app, I just don't understand why they have to move everything. There was a heart so that you could add things to your wish list, and now I can not find it or anything saying "Add to wishlist." I understand updating the app to make it supposedly better and more accessible but now, it is just more confusing and hard to use :/

Amazon not like it used to be. Harder and harder to contact customer service chat about problems. Used to be able to hit the return button tap on chat now and speak with someone. Just spend a half an hour trying to contact someone with no luck. Continuous jumping through hoops. Stopped ordering amazonfresh because of expensive service charges. Now considering giving up Amazon Prime subscription. Just going to return these for a full refund and not reorder. Cheaper products in stores.

Some improvements to customer service can be made such as when people request that a certain Carrier does not get their packages and you have numerous complaints on this. Career this career should be either let go or not even called for the horrible customer service. We're received by them.. Secondly I've noticed lately when I have purchased some orders at the start when it shipped. You're able to can't see any updates. This needs to be fixed right away as well to improve customer service...

It's been fine but UI sucks when an order was delayed and they asked for confirmation if I still want the package. I had to log on to my desktop to confirm, but the cancel option is in the app. It was easier to cancel and order again than confirming that I still want the package. Because of the confirmation thing my package ended up being 2 days later than the supposed delayed date.

Aplication itself is garbage. Not user friendly experience. Can't find what I want fast enough. Missing accurate filters. Search sucks, it gives me completely different results. Can't contact to seller, it sends me to FAQ. Delivery aslo sucks. One time I got used thing, but in delivery it said "new". Can't recieve my things on time. Sometimes it takes 5 or more days for seller to send me my order

I don't use a credit or debit card for the app. However, when using my gift card balance, I can't purchase anything. The continue button won't light up even if I have enough for shipping and the original cost of the product. There's no point in Amazon gift cards if they won't work. I tried using the customer service texting and call method, but they kept telling me to check my gift card balance even though I am aware of how much I have.

I have been a prime member for a very long time, Now i am disappointed and for the first time searching for products other places, most of the China Stores on Amazon are lying, they show over night and then it come in 2 to 5 days. I have canceled many orders by now. Very disappointed, i guess, back to other outlets. Amazon is falling apart and failing.

Can no longer take screenshots due to "security restrictions" when processing amounts of purchases. This is the last straw , I started taking screenshots bc sellers are changing prices after subscriptions ordered. Plus I rarely can view my "ordered" items on this app - it spins & spins. But this preventing us from proving the price we ordered/purchased products at , is a deal breaker . It needs REMOVED.

Once you install this app in your phone you can never get rid of it. It stays in there and if you update your phone after uninstalled it will return to your downloads immediately. I don't shop on Amazon often at all and it takes up room I could use for other apps I do use frequently. Downloaders beware!!!

The app isn't bad but could use some improvement. One feature I would love to see it would be a dark mode. One negative would be the purchasing of ebooks. I get that it is a Google Play terms of service violation. Perhaps an ability to send it directly to "save for later"?

Amazon used to be amazing but it's getting harder to find good deals. My main issue tho is the shipping in the past you would place an order and it your items would be shipped out the next day now I'm finding alot of times it takes them a week before they ship out. Like the last thing I ordered it on Monday here it is Thursday and it's still not shipped and I don't wanna here anything about waiting for payment because as soon as I'm done ordering I look at my bank and the money is already gone.

Yesterday this app wasted almost 1Gb cellular data for 2 hours, like I watched an Ultra HD movie online. This is absurd. This is a simple shopping app, but it appears there I something hidden which spends so much data. And it is not only me. I searched on net and found a lot of user with the same problem. I check the background usage in the settings and it is blocked in my mobile for this app, so everything spent is shown as foreground. Start thinking to uninstall it...

I don't want the app anymore but it won't allow me to uninstall it. Even after clicking on "uninstall" it is still on my phone. I've tried several times, but without success. I I have decided to cancel my account subscription to get rid of the app. The positive side to that is I will save a lot of money because I won't be tempted to order products anymore.

A poorly designed app : excessively complicated (frequently showing irrelevant things) and yet delivers limited functionality (eg. Cannot manage subscriptions through this app, have to use browser version). In addition to this there is Amazon shopping experience which has become really lazy and low quality recently. I don't buy things from this company and yet manage to find everything elsewhere at usually a better price and from a provider who I can query specifically. this app : A poor job
